script:
# The Future of AI-Powered Content Creation: What No One is Telling You

## Hook (0-15s)
What if everything you know about AI-Powered Content Creation is about to change forever? In the next 60 seconds, I'll reveal three predictions that experts don't want you to hear.

## Main Points

### Point 1: The Disruption
By 2025, AI-Powered Content Creation will make 40% of current jobs completely obsolete. But here's what they're not telling you - this creates an unprecedented opportunity for those who understand what's coming.

### Point 2: The Revolution
The next wave of AI-Powered Content Creation won't come from Silicon Valley or big tech. Instead, the real revolution is happening in unexpected places, giving everyday people incredible new powers.

### Point 3: The Opportunity
While everyone else is panicking about these changes, I'll show you exactly how to position yourself to benefit enormously from this shift in the next 12 months.

## Call-to-Action
If you want to stay ahead of these massive changes, hit subscribe now and tap the notification bell. Drop a comment with "FUTURE" and I'll send you my exclusive report on preparing for the AI-Powered Content Creation revolution.
